Outbreak Management Expenses relate to all outbreak management expenses and is not just limited to direct care expenses.
The values reported in this section are independent of the care labour costs reported above and are not required to add to a total. Do not reduce the care labour expenses by the amounts reported in the Outbreak Management Expense section.
◦ Infection Prevention and Control (IPC) lead costs

Explanation required if (Other outbreak costs/Total outbreak management costs) > 30% (service level)
You have reported other outbreak costs to be greater than 30% of total outbreak management costs. Please provide a detailed breakdown listing the different expenses reported in this category (description and amount)
